CustomField.formula: IF ( Total_Lead_Score__c < 5, IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_000.gif', '0'), IF (Total_Lead_Score__c < 10, IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_100.gif', '1'), IF (Total_Lead_Score__c < 15, IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_200.gif', '2'), IF (Total_Lead_Score__c < 20, IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_300.gif', '3'), IF (Total_Lead_Score__c < 25, IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_400.gif', '4'), IMAGE ('/img/samples/stars_500.gif', '5'))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Score Image
